item.title: rename
item.description: TIL about the status bar on iTerm2. It’s pretty useful with a mix of builtin components like Current Directory or git state and user defined variables or functions. To access and configure the status bar go to Preferences > Profiles > Session. Turn on Status bar enabled then click Configure Status Bar. Again, scripting plays a huge part in how useful the status bar is. As an example: # In ~/.
